name: SEXUAL MANGA ANIME BALLS
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Arcade game with themes Anime, inspired by the game Arkanoid, in which the main task is to destroy slabs and bricks. The player controls a horizontally moving platform to destroy the bricks.

The game has a variety of levels with high complexity (as in the old-old games). There is a local multiplayer.

The game has a very accurate platform! If you like classical children's games, check it out!

Features:
- achievements;
- Pleasant graphics;
- simple mouse control;
- Interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures in the world ANIME
